description: This file is a React component used as the root layout of a Remix-based web application. It manages the overall HTML structure, including linking stylesheets, setting meta tags, and rendering child components through Outlet.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external resources (stylesheets and fonts) to be included in the HTML head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that sets up the HTML structure, including head meta tags, stylesheets, and layout placeholders.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main component that renders the Outlet for nested routes.
